name: KEHWA
description: “Kehwa” has been used as a medicine for thousands of years for its great health benefits.

name: CAPPUCCINO
description: A cappuccino is an Italian coffee drink that is traditionally prepared with double espresso, hot milk.

name: ESPRESSO
description: A strong brew of coffee produced by forcing boiled water under pressure through finely ground coffee.

name: MACCHIATO COFFEE
description: Macchiato is mostly drunk by espresso lovers who want a bit of a sweeter taste.

name: BLACK COFFEE
description: Black coffee contains Vitamin B2, B3, B5, Manganese, potassium and magnesium.

name: CHICKEN CORN SOUP
description: Chicken Corn Soup is a delicious and nutritional starter to have before meal.
